organizations: 8th United States Circuit Court of Appeals
lead_paragraph: A federal appeals court upheld a lower court ruling that lets a fantasy baseball company use players’ names and statistics without paying a licensing fee. The 8th United States Circuit Court of Appeals panel in St. Louis ruled that CBC Distribution and Marketing does not have to pay the players.
